ComicInfo.Title: Season 2
ComicInfo.Series: Edgar Allan Poe's Snifter of Terror, Season Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
AHOY Comics' snarky anthology/desecration of Edgar Allan Poe returns for a new season-beginning with the ultimate Poe mashup! In Dean Motter's "The Tell-Tale Black Cask of Usher," the drink-addled writer falls prey to his own horrific imagination. Hunt Emerson offers another slapstick "Poe and the Black Cat." A selection of horrific prose and pictures rounds out the issue. Painted cover by Richard Williams (MAD).
ContentsThe Tell-Tale Black Cask of UsherFour PoemsVoodoo BurgerPoe and the Black Cat
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 22:30:08. [CVDB721621]
ComicInfo.Writer: Brendan Mallory, Dean Motter, Hunt Emerson, Walt Shepperd
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dean Motter, Elliott Mattice, Greg Scott, Hunt Emerson
ComicInfo.Inker: Alex Ogle, Elliott Mattice, Greg Scott, Hunt Emerson
ComicInfo.Characters: Edgar Allan Poe, Pluto, The Raven
